survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the level of cybersecurity awareness and practices among employees in various organizations to identify gaps and improve security protocols.

questions.question_text: How often does your organization conduct cybersecurity training sessions?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How often does your organization conduct cybersecurity training sessions?

questions.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity measures does your organization currently implement? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format. Ensure options are clear and cover common security measures.

script.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity measures does your organization currently implement? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Have you ever encountered a cybersecurity incident (e.g., phishing, malware) at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge incident frequency. Keep options simple.

script.question_text: Have you ever encountered a cybersecurity incident (e.g., phishing, malware) at your workplace?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q3, please briefly describe the incident and how it was handled.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed incident descriptions. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to Q3, please briefly describe the incident and how it was handled.

questions.question_text: How confident are you in identifying phishing emails?
answer_options: I don't know what phishing is
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert-like scale for confidence levels. Ensure clarity in options.

script.question_text: How confident are you in identifying phishing emails?
answer_options: I don't know what phishing is

questions.question_text: Does your organization have a clear policy for reporting cybersecurity incidents?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess policy awareness. Keep options straightforward.

script.question_text: Does your organization have a clear policy for reporting cybersecurity incidents?

questions.question_text: What is your biggest concern regarding cybersecurity in your organization?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an 'Other' option for additional input. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional open text (MULTI_CHOICE)

script.question_text: What is your biggest concern regarding cybersecurity in your organization?

questions.question_text: How often do you update your passwords for work-related accounts?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess password hygiene. Ensure options cover common intervals.

script.question_text: How often do you update your passwords for work-related accounts?

questions.question_text: Do you use a password manager for work-related accounts?
answer_options: I don't know what a password manager is
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge tool adoption. Keep options simple.

script.question_text: Do you use a password manager for work-related accounts?
answer_options: I don't know what a password manager is

questions.question_text: What additional cybersecurity measures would you like to see implemented in your organization?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What additional cybersecurity measures would you like to see implemented in your organization?
